thread.title: Justin Bieber parties hard in NZ, drinks Hennessy at show
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber parties hard in NZ, drinks Hennessy at show

title: Justin Bieber parties hard in NZ, drinks Hennessy at show
text:
Justin Bieber parties hard in NZ, drinks Hennessy at show 2nd Oct 2015 8:25 AM Local Real Estate Cars For Sale 
TAKING his shirt off, partying with a popular hip-hop group and swigging from what appears to be a bottle of Hennesy - Justin Bieber had quite the night last night. 
The chart-topping pop star is in New Zealand on a whirlwind promotional trip, but Bieber hasn't let jet lag cut short his activities. 
Photos and videos from hip-hop group Rae Sremmurd's Auckland show last night show Bieber showed up on stage, dancing, singing and drinking with the duo. A photo posted by Justin Bieber Crew (@jbcrewdotcom) on Oct 1, 2015 at 8:21am PDT 
At one point, he pours what appears to be a $60-bottle of Hennessy out on stage; at another, he appears on the balcony above The Studio's main stage with his shirt off while surrounded by women. 
Bieber leaves New Zealand today after cramming in a bungy jump off Auckland's Harbour Bridge, and appearing at a "Bieber-que" hosted by radio station ZM. 
He appeared at Rae Sremmurd's show after performing an intimate showcase for around 150 fans, and recording interviews with TV3's Paul Henry and Story's Heather du Plessis-Allan. A photo posted by Justin Bieber Crew (@jbcrewdotcom) on Oct 1, 2015 at 8:30am PDT entertainment
